text: Gillett's Crossing (also known as Gillett's Crossing St Annes and Gillett's Crossing Old Links) was a halt on the Fylde Coast railway line, in Lancashire, England. It opened on 1 October 1913 for the newly introduced railmotor service. It closed on 1 January 1949. ==References== * , accessed 6 December 2010 * , accessed 6 December 2010 * Welch, M.S. title: Gillett's Crossing Halt railway station
